The chart displays the change in suicide death rate by age in Kazakhstan for the year 1995. It includes data for different age categories (5-14 years old, 15-49 years old, 50-69 years old, 70+ years old), an age-standardized rate, and total death rates across all ages. The values are measured per 100,000 individuals.

- The x-axis represents the suicide death rate per 100,000 individuals.

- The source is cited as IHME, Global Burden of Disease (GBD).
